Citrus Pruning

Prune to keep plant height down to reduce shading for color development and for ease of harvest.

Pruning - As a shrub, Citrus are more trimmed to limit growth rather than pruned to develop fruit wood (e.g., Apples).

  • Tree ShapingFact Sheet (UC Davis)
